summary: Chat application with multiple chat boxes and navigation between them

existing_features.title: Add a close/exit button to the chat interface that allows users to return to a chat selection view or main navigation
Implement navigation between different chat boxes/sessions, allowing users to switch between multiple chat conversations
Ensure ChatSidebar component displays all available chat boxes and allows selection to navigate between them

new_feature_requests.summary: Add ability to exit chats and navigate to different chat boxes

projectName: Add chat exit and navigation between different chat boxes
